articles.description: A Pride in Hull parade will be held from Hull College to Queens Gardens, followed by a festival packed with music and entertainment
articles.content:
Pride in Hull returns to the city centre this weekend and motorists are being advised to plan ahead for their journeys, as a number of road closures will be in place for the event.
After two years o… [+1638 chars]
